MsgJp: 悪くない――その調子だ
MsgEn: Not bad. Keep it up.

MsgJp: 目の前の敵に集中するんだ
MsgEn: Focus on the enemy in front of you.

MsgJp: 切り込むぞ！
MsgEn: Let's cut them down!

MsgJp: よし、ここは制圧した
MsgEn: Good, we have taken control here.

MsgJp: それで良い、次に向かうぞ！
MsgEn: That's good. Let's move on to the next one.

MsgJp: 新手の敵だ、注意しろ！
MsgEn: A new type of enemy, be careful!

MsgJp: 今こそ名をあげる時だ――
MsgEn: Now is the time to make a name for yourself.

MsgJp: 相変わらずの臭いだな
MsgEn: The smell is still the same as always.

MsgJp: 今日こそ決着を付けてくれる！
MsgEn: Today is the day we settle this!

MsgJp: 逃がしたか――
MsgEn: Did they escape?

MsgJp: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
MsgEn: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

MsgJp: 会いに来てやったぞ、金色の戦士よ
MsgEn: I have come to meet you, golden warrior.

MsgJp: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
MsgEn: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

MsgJp: 楽しませてくれる
MsgEn: Let me entertain you.

MsgJp: 今日はここまでだ
MsgEn: Today is the end.

MsgJp: 次を心待ちにしているぞ
MsgEn: I am looking forward to the next one.

MsgJp: まさか――この――俺が――
MsgEn: I can't believe... that I...

MsgJp: 存分に楽しませてもらったぞ――
MsgEn: I've thoroughly enjoyed myself――

MsgJp: ほら、よそ見しない！
MsgEn: Look, don't get distracted!

MsgJp: はやくやっちゃって！
MsgEn: Get it over with!

MsgJp: こっちにまわさないで！
MsgEn: Don't bring it over here!

MsgJp: さぁ、大掃除の開始よ！
MsgEn: Alright, it's time to start mopping up!

MsgJp: その調子その調子！
MsgEn: Keep it up, keep it up!

MsgJp: 良い感じ良い感じ！
MsgEn: Looking good, looking good!

MsgJp: 気を抜くなよ
MsgEn: Don't let your guard down.

MsgJp: 良い動きだ！
MsgEn: Good move!

MsgJp: 落ち着いて仕留めるんだ！
MsgEn: Stay calm and finish them off!

MsgJp: さあ！全ての敵を切り倒せ！
MsgEn: Okay! Cut down every enemy!

MsgJp: この調子で駆け抜けるぞ！
MsgEn: Push through at this pace!

MsgJp: よくやった、付いてこい！
MsgEn: Well done, follow me!

MsgJp: ほう――大将のお出ましだ
MsgEn: Well - here comes the general.

MsgJp: こいつは手強いな
MsgEn: This one is tough.

MsgJp: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
MsgEn: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

MsgJp: 会いに来てやったぞ、金色の戦士よ
MsgEn: I have come to meet you, golden warrior.

MsgJp: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
MsgEn: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

MsgJp: 楽しませてくれる
MsgEn: Let me entertain you.

MsgJp: まさか――この――俺が――
MsgEn: I can't believe... that I...

MsgJp: 存分に楽しませてもらったぞ――
MsgEn: I've thoroughly enjoyed myself――

MsgJp:
《竜の巣》の魔物は
レスタニアのそれとは訳が違う
特にドラゴンはなおさらだ！
MsgEn:
The monsters of the "Dragon's Nest" are different
from those of Lestania, especially the dragons!

MsgJp:
今のうちに夢とロマンで
心を満たしておくといい！
恐怖でチャンスを逃すことのないようにな
MsgEn:
Fill your heart with dreams and romance while you
still can!
Don't let fear keep you from taking chances.

MsgJp:
開催期間になったら
再度、俺の元に参加を申し出てくれ！
MsgEn:
When the event is held again, please come back
and participate!

MsgJp: ゼルキンさんが船の準備をはじめたそうよ
MsgEn:
It seems that Zerkin has started preparing the
ship.

MsgJp:
危ないことはしないでほしいけれど
夢を追いかけることは素敵なことですよね
MsgEn:
I don't want you to do anything dangerous, but...
it's nice to follow your dreams, isn't it?

MsgJp:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを
確認の上、神殿内の《港洞》の船上にいる
ゼルキンさんをお訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please check the Lestania
News and visit Zerkin, who is on board the ship in
the "Cave Harbor" within the temple.

MsgJp:
船長はバカほど海とロマンを愛してるんだ
おっとあんたもその口だったけか
MsgEn:
Captains love the sea and romance as much as any
fool.
Oh wait, you're one of them, aren't you?

MsgJp: ま、俺もそうだがよ――
MsgEn: Well, I'm the same, you know...

MsgJp:
うん、まもなく船の修理もおわり出航の準備も
整いつつあるよ
MsgEn:
Yes, the repairs on the ship will be finished
soon and preparations for departure are also
coming together.

MsgJp:
君も《竜の巣》に渡るつもりなら十分に仕度すると
いいね
MsgEn:
If you are going to cross over to the "Dragon's
Nest" too, you'd better be well-prepared.

MsgJp:
《竜の巣》に向かう船の準備で
港もいつもより活気がありますよね
MsgEn:
When the ships start getting ready to head to the
"Dragon's Nest", the Harbor is always more lively
than usual.

MsgJp:
《竜の巣》では覚者の力をもってしても
まともに太刀打ちできんだろう
MsgEn:
Even with the power of Arisen, one may not be
able to stand a chance in the "Dragon's Nest".

MsgJp:
だが、上手くやれば名を上げられる
上手くやれなくても誇れる挑戦を手にできる
心が決まれば、船はいつでも出そうではないか！
MsgEn:
But if you do well, you can make a name for
yourself.
If you don't, you can still get a challenge you
can be proud of.
If your heart is set on it, the ship can always
set sail any time!

MsgJp:
挑もうという覚悟と準備ができたなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてくれ
MsgEn:
If you have the determination and preparation to
take on the challenge, then please enter the
mission right away.

MsgJp:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
ほら、ロマンが呼んでいるぞっ！！
MsgEn:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

MsgJp:
ついに洋撃船が出航するそうですよ！
港の方々は大忙しです
MsgEn:
It seems that the Western Expedition ship will
finally set sail!
The people at the port are very busy.

MsgJp:
覚者さまも行かれるのですか？
無事帰ってきてお話聞かせてくださいね
MsgEn:
Will you be going, Arisen?
Please return safely and tell us your story.

MsgJp:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを
確認の上、神殿内の《港洞》の船上にいる
ゼルキンさんをお訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please check the Lestania
News and visit Zerkin, who is on board the ship in
the "Cave Harbor" within the temple.

MsgJp:
さぁ、洋撃船はいつでも出航できるぜ
《竜の巣》に渡りたいモノ好きどもがいればの
話だがな――
MsgEn:
Come on, our ocean-going ship is ready to sail.
If there are those who want to cross over to the
"Dragon's Nest," this may be your opportunity...

MsgJp:
けど、あんた
もしも行って戻ってこれたら
話ぐらいは聞かせてくれよな
MsgEn:
But... if you ever go there and come back, at
least tell us your story.

MsgJp:
いよいよ出航だね――
僕はこの時の港の雰囲気がたまらなく好きなんだ
MsgEn:
It's finally time to set sail, huh――
I really love the atmosphere of the port at this
time.

MsgJp: 覚者さまも《竜の巣》に向かうのですか？
MsgEn:
Lord Arisen, are you also heading to the Dragon's
Nest?

MsgJp:
あそこに行くのは
よほど腕の立つ奴かただの命知らずだって
船乗りの兄はよく言っていました
MsgEn:
My brother, who is a sailor, used to say that the
only people who go there are either very skilled
or just plain daredevils.

MsgJp:
今は《竜の巣》での戦果の確認中だ！
働いた分の報酬は出るから、そう焦るな
MsgEn:
I am currently verifying the results of our
battle at the Dragon's Nest!
Don't worry, you will receive your rewards for
the work you've done, so there's no need to rush.

MsgJp: 《竜の巣》で大きな戦果をあげた人がいるようです
MsgEn:
It seems that someone has achieved great results
at the Dragon's Nest.

MsgJp:
もしかして、覚者さまが大活躍されたんですか？
ゼルキンさんからの発表が待ち遠しいですね
MsgEn:
Could it be that the Arisen has made a great
contribution?
I can't wait for Zerkin's announcement.

MsgJp: 船長が《竜の巣》で戦果をあげたものを確認中だ
MsgEn:
The captain is currently confirming the
achievements at the Dragon's Nest.

MsgJp:
《竜の巣》なんざぁ俺は行きたくないが
あそこでく繰り広げられた冒険譚を聞くのが
楽しみなんだよ
MsgEn:
I don't want to go to the "Dragon's Nest", but
I'm looking forward to hearing about the
adventures that took place there.

MsgJp:
今回もまた船が派手に壊れちゃったなぁ
さっそく修理に必要な見積もりを出さなくちゃ
MsgEn:
Once again, the ship has been spectacularly
destroyed. I need to promptly request an estimate
for repairs.

MsgJp:
船が無事に帰ってきてうれしいです
いったいどんな冒険が繰り広げられたのでしょうか？
MsgEn:
I am glad the ship returned safely.
I wonder what kind of adventure unfolded there?

MsgJp:
ああ、今回の取り分は送っておいたぞ！
保管ボックスから確認してくれ
MsgEn:
Ah, I've already sent your share for this time!
Please check it from the Storage Box.

MsgJp:
あそこはとんでもなく危険なのにまた行きたくなる
そうだろう？　覚者よ！
MsgEn:
It's a terribly dangerous place there, isn't it?
Yet you still want to go there, Arisen?

MsgJp:
また次の航海を思い描けば船の修理にも
自ずと精が出るというものだ！
がはははは！
MsgEn:
Just imagining the next voyage brings vigor to
the ship repairs as well!
It's natural for spirits to rise, isn't it?
Hahaha!

MsgJp:
おぅ、丁度、戦果の集計がついたとこだ
これはあんたの報酬だ、受け取りな
MsgEn:
Oh, just in time. The results of the battle have
been tallied. This is your reward. Take it.

MsgJp: 覚者さまのお名前も載っていると良いですね
MsgEn:
It would be nice to have the name of the Arisen
included as well.

MsgJp:
ゼルキンさんからのお知らせが
レスタニアニュースに載っています
MsgEn:
There is an announcement from Zerkin in the
Lestania News.

MsgJp:
あんた、ドラゴンや魔物はどうだった！？
今度一杯ご馳走するから
ゆっくり話を聞かせてくれよな
MsgEn:
How were the dragons and monsters?!
I'll treat you to a drink next time, so take your
time and tell me your story.

MsgJp:
船長は手に入れた報酬を
毎回、次の航海の資金にしている
MsgEn:
The captain uses the rewards obtained
each time as funds for the next voyage.

MsgJp:
ほんとあきれるけど
その情熱には感服するよ
MsgEn: It's truly astounding, but I admire that passion.

MsgJp: 海と冒険と竜との戦い、ロマンですよね――
MsgEn:
The sea, adventure, and battles with dragons,
it's all so romantic, isn't it?

MsgJp: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
MsgEn: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

MsgJp: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
MsgEn:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

MsgJp: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
MsgEn:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

MsgJp: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
MsgEn: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

MsgJp: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
MsgEn:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

MsgJp: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
MsgEn:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

MsgJp: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
MsgEn: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

MsgJp: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
MsgEn:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

MsgJp: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
MsgEn:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

MsgJp: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
MsgEn: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

MsgJp: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
MsgEn:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

MsgJp: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
MsgEn:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

MsgJp: 3種の宝石を集めると、より強大な竜が現れるという噂だ
MsgEn:
Rumor has it that when you collect three types of
Gems, a more powerful dragon will appear.

MsgJp: さらなる大物を狙うならば、挑戦するがいい！
MsgEn: If you want to go even bigger, go for it!

MsgJp:
噂の大物が現れたぞ！
《エルダードラゴン・ブレイズ》のおでましだ！
MsgEn:
The rumored big fish has appeared! It's the Elder
Dragon Blaze!

MsgJp: 討伐できれば戦功をはずむぞ！
MsgEn: If we can subdue them, it will earn us War Merit!

MsgJp: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
MsgEn: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

MsgJp: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
MsgEn:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

MsgJp: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
MsgEn:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

MsgJp: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
MsgEn: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

MsgJp: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
MsgEn:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

MsgJp: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
MsgEn:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

MsgJp:
南の森で恐ろしい魔物を見たという
噂が広がっている
MsgEn:
People have been talking about seeing a terrible
monster in the southern forests.

MsgJp:
まもなく討伐が開始されるだろう――
おまえも参加するならば
準備しておくといい――
MsgEn:
The hunt will begin shortly.
If you're joining in too, be prepared...

MsgJp:
討伐が開始されたなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
MsgEn:
If the hunt has begun, visit me once again and
come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

MsgJp:
ローガンさんが討伐準備をしている魔物は
異界を渡る力を持つそうです
MsgEn:
The monster that ser Logan is preparing to subdue
seems to have the power to travel through
different realms.

MsgJp:
多くの覚者さまの力が必要になるため
是非協力してあげて下さいね
MsgEn:
We will need the power of many Arisen for this,
so please lend us your assistance.

MsgJp:
詳しい情報は
《商店区》にある白衛騎士団の詰所にいる
ローガンさんをお訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please visit Ser Logan at
the White Knights' Headquarters in the Shopping
District.

MsgJp:
そういえば、《古の祭祀場》に
強い竜力の淀みが発生していることは
知っている？
MsgEn:
By the way, do you know that there is Dragon
Force accumulating in the "Ancient Place of
Rituals"?

MsgJp:
オールドグロウエントか、それより
もっと恐ろしい何かか――
MsgEn:
Old Grove Ent?
Or something even more terrifying?

MsgJp:
白衛騎士団も確認に動いているそうよ
神殿の騎士団本部にも
情報を取りに行ってみて
MsgEn:
The White Knights are also working to confirm
this.
You can also go to the Knights Headquarters in
the Temple to get more information.

MsgJp:
対峙した者の話によれば
相手はケタ違いの化け物らしい
MsgEn:
According to those who have confronted it, the
opponent is a monster of a totally different
level.

MsgJp:
命を落とすことのないよう
十分気をつけて戦ってくれ
MsgEn:
Please fight with utmost care, so that you do not
lose your life.

MsgJp:
挑める準備ができてるなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてみてくれ
MsgEn:
If you're ready to take on the challenge,
participate in the mission right away.

MsgJp:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
MsgEn:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

MsgJp:
ローガンさんが討伐隊を
動かし始めたみたいです
MsgEn:
It seems that Ser Logan has started preparing for
a hunt.

MsgJp:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》にある白衛騎士団の詰所にいる
ローガンさんをお訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please check the Lestania
News and visit Ser Logan at the White Knights'
Headquarters in the "Shopping District".

MsgJp:
《古の祭祀場》に、恐ろしい魔物が
姿を現したの！
いつものエントなど比較にならない
強大な魔物よ
MsgEn:
A terrible monster has appeared in the Ancient
Place of Rituals!
It's a mighty monster that can't be compared to
the usual Ent...

MsgJp:
今、神殿の騎士団本部が中心となって
討伐隊を組織しているわ
MsgEn:
Right now the headquarters of the Temple Knight
Order is leading the way in organizing a hunting
party.

MsgJp:
貴方もぜひ力を貸して！
このミスリウのためにも――
MsgEn:
Please lend your strength as well!
For the sake of Mysree, too...

MsgJp:
討伐に参加してくれた
多くの勇気ある戦士達のおかげで
あの化け物を退けることができた
MsgEn:
Thanks to the brave soldiers who participated in
the subjugation, we were able to repel that
monster.

MsgJp: 心から礼を言わせてもらうよ
MsgEn: I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart.

MsgJp:
森に現れた魔物を
退けることができたそうです
MsgEn:
We hear that they were able to repel the monster
that appeared in the forest.

MsgJp:
レスタニアニュースでも
取り上げられていますよ
MsgEn: It has also been featured in Lestania News.

MsgJp:
先の森の
魔物討伐における報酬を支給している
MsgEn:
The reward for the forest monsters hunt is
currently being distributed.

MsgJp:
まだのものは
保管ボックスから受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
Please retrieve the items that are still in the
storage box.

MsgJp:
先の戦闘評価が終わっている――
報酬を支給するので受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
The previous combat evaluation has ended. Please
collect the reward.

MsgJp: 先の魔物討伐の戦果が発表されています
MsgEn:
The outcome of the previous enemy subjugation has
been announced.

MsgJp:
報酬も支給されていますので
レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
MsgEn:
Rewards are also being paid, so please check it
out on Lestania News!

MsgJp: 永遠不変をうそぶく厚顔なる白竜と覚者よ――
MsgEn:
Oh, the arrogant white dragon, who claims to be
eternal—, and you, Arisen――

MsgJp:
永遠なるは我が輝き、不変なるは我が志し――
思い知るがよい――
MsgEn:
My radiance is eternal, my determination
unwavering. You shall come to know this.

MsgJp:
うつろう世にしがみつく
哀れなる白竜と覚者よ――
MsgEn:
Oh pitiful White Dragon and Arisen, clinging to
this fleeting world...

MsgJp:
白がくすみ人が絶えても我が輝きは不滅――
この黄金こそが永遠の象徴――
MsgEn:
Even if the white fades and people disappear, my
brilliance is everlasting.
This gold is a symbol of eternity.

MsgJp: 世界は我が物と信じて疑わぬ白竜と覚者よ――
MsgEn:
O, white dragon who believes the world is theirs
without doubt, and you, Arisen――

MsgJp:
教えてやろう
貴様らが信じる理のもろさを――
MsgEn:
Allow me to show you the fragility of the world
order you believe in.

MsgJp:
伝説で語り継がれた黄金に輝く竜が
空で待っているそうだ
MsgEn:
It is said that a legendary dragon, shining with
golden light, awaits in the sky.

MsgJp:
相手は想像を絶する化け物だ
今から準備をはじめておくといい――
MsgEn:
The enemy is an unimaginable monster.
It's best to start preparing now--

MsgJp:
討伐が開始されたなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
MsgEn:
If the hunt has begun, visit me once again and
come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

MsgJp: 黄金の竜の討伐準備が進んでいます
MsgEn:
Preparations for the defeat of the Golden Dragon
are underway.

MsgJp:
一匹の魔物の討伐とは思えない
大部隊による長期戦になるそうです
MsgEn:
It doesn't seem it'll be like defeating a single
monster.
It appears it will be a long-term battle waged by
a large force.

MsgJp:
それでも――
伝説の竜を打ち倒すことなんて
できるのでしょうか
MsgEn:
Even so...
Is it possible to strike down the legendary
dragon?

MsgJp:
詳しい情報は《商店区》の
海辺の見える竜の礎前にいる
ハンコックさんをお訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please visit Mr. Hancock in
the Shopping District near the Dragon's Keystone
with a view of the seashore.

MsgJp: いよいよ生ける伝説、黄金竜との決戦だ
MsgEn:
It's finally the decisive battle with the living
legend, the Golden Dragon.

MsgJp:
この戦いは奴が倒れるまで戦いは引き継がれる
最後まであきらるな
MsgEn:
This battle will not be over until they are
defeated.
We must not give up, no matter how long it takes.

MsgJp:
挑める準備ができてるなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてみてくれ
MsgEn:
If you're ready to take on the challenge,
participate in the mission right away.

MsgJp:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
MsgEn:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

MsgJp:
黄金の竜の討伐遠征が
始まっています
MsgEn:
The expedition to defeat the Golden Dragon has
begun.

MsgJp:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》の海辺の見える竜の礎前にいる
ハンコックさんをお訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please check Lestania News
and visit ser Hancock in the Shopping District
near the Dragon's Keystone with a view of the
seashore.

MsgJp: 戦果の報告をまとめているところだ
MsgEn:
I'm in the process of summarizing the results of
the battle.

MsgJp:
報酬はその後支給するので
待っていてくれ
MsgEn:
The reward will be distributed afterwards, please
wait.

MsgJp: 遠征が終わったようですね
MsgEn: It seems that the expedition has come to an end.

MsgJp: 本当にあの黄金の竜を倒せたのでしょうか――
MsgEn: Did we really manage to defeat the Golden Dragon?

MsgJp:
先の黄金竜討伐に対する
報酬を支給中だ
MsgEn:
Rewards for the recent defeat of the Golden
Dragon are now being distributed.

MsgJp: 保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
MsgEn: Please retrieve it from the Storage Box.

MsgJp:
黄金竜討伐の戦果に対する
報酬を支給する
MsgEn:
The reward for the successful elimination of the
Golden Dragon.

MsgJp: 協力に感謝する――ありがとう
MsgEn: We appreciate your cooperation. Thank you.

MsgJp:
先の遠征における戦果が
発表されています
MsgEn:
The results of the recent expedition have been
published.

MsgJp:
報酬も支給されていますので
レスタニアニュースより確認くださいね
MsgEn:
Rewards are being paid, so please check it out in
Lestania News!

MsgJp: 完全なる者たちは何処に――
MsgEn: Where are the perfect ones...

MsgJp:
我に完全を与える主よ――
ここにはいないのか――
MsgEn:
O Lord, grant me perfection—
Is it not here—

MsgJp:
戦いは永遠を知る方便――
空しさなど覚えるものか――
MsgEn:
Battle is the means to know eternity――
Why remember emptiness――

MsgJp:
私の予感だが、ほどなくレスタニアに
暗雲が立ち込めようとしている
MsgEn:
I have a feeling that soon, a dark cloud will
loom over Lestania.

MsgJp:
これは凶悪な魔物があらわれる前兆だ
気をつけるといい
MsgEn:
This is an omen of the coming of a vicious demon.
Be careful.

MsgJp:
魔物が姿を現したならば
再度、私の元を訪れて
討伐隊への参加を期待しているぞ
MsgEn:
If the monsters show themselves, I hope you'll
visit me again and join the hunt team!

MsgJp:
レスタニアで恐ろしい気配を感じたという
噂が流れています
MsgEn:
Rumors are circulating of a frightening presence
in Lestania.

MsgJp:
詳しい情報は
《商店区》にいるコーネリアさんを
お訪ねください
MsgEn:
For more information, please visit ser Cornelia
in the "Shopping District"

MsgJp:
つい最近、レスタニアで
恐ろしい魔物の気配を感じたという
報告が舞い込んできたのだ
MsgEn:
We have recently received reports of a terrifying
demonic presence in Lestania.

MsgJp:
恐るべき魔力の息吹を持つという噂もある
十分に気を付けるといい
MsgEn:
There are rumors that it possesses a breath of
fearsome magical power. It would be wise to be
extremely cautious.

MsgJp:
挑める準備と覚悟ができたなら
さっそく討伐隊に参加してくれ
ファビオ様は重大な用ゆえ
私が窓口を任されている
MsgEn:
If you are prepared and ready for the challenge,
please join the hunting party right away.
Lord Fabio has urgent matters to attend to, so I
have been entrusted with handling the
arrangements.

MsgJp:
また自分の成果がどれほどなのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
MsgEn:
Also, you should check the ranking boards located
throughout the Temple to see how well you did.

MsgJp:
恐るべき異界の魔物の気配が
確認されているそうです
MsgEn:
It seems that the presence of fearsome enemy
creatures from the Other World has been confirmed.

MsgJp:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》にいるコーネリアさんを
お訪ねください
MsgEn:
For detailed information, please check Lestania
News, then visit Ms. Cornelia in the Commercial
District.

MsgJp:
何とか退けることができたようだな
さすがだ、覚者よ
MsgEn:
It seems that you were able to somehow fend it
off. Truly impressive, Arisen.

MsgJp:
戦果を集計しているところだ
報酬支給はもう少し時間をくれ
MsgEn:
We are currently tallying the results of the
battle. Please give us a little more time for
reward distribution.

MsgJp:
ただいま魔物と交戦した方々の戦果を
集計しています
MsgEn:
We are currently calculating the results of those
who have fought monsters just now.

MsgJp: 発表まで今しばらくお待ちください
MsgEn:
Please wait a little longer until the
announcement.

MsgJp:
魔物討伐の報酬が支給されている
保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
The reward for defeating the enemies has been
paid. Please accept it from the Storage Box.

MsgJp:
先の戦闘評価が終わっている
報酬を支給するので受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
The previous combat evaluation has ended. Please
collect the reward.

MsgJp: 先の魔物討伐の戦果が発表されています
MsgEn:
The outcome of the previous enemy subjugation has
been announced.

MsgJp:
報酬も支給されていますので、
レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
MsgEn:
Rewards are also being paid, so please check it
out on Lestania News!

MsgJp: オマイラ――覚えとけよ！
MsgEn: You all―― remember this!

MsgJp: おいおい――調子にのるなって
MsgEn: Hey hey, don't get carried away.

MsgJp: 腐ってもやっぱり覚者か！？
MsgEn:
Even if you're rotten, you're still an Arisen,
huh!?

MsgJp:
２つ以上のミッションには
エントリーできないぞ
MsgEn: You can't enter more than one mission!

MsgJp:
先にエントリーしている方のミッションを
終わらせるか、エントリーを取り消して
再度こちらに来るんだ
MsgEn:
Either finish the mission you've already entered,
or cancel your entry, then come back again.

MsgJp:
ボルド大坑道へ調査にいったゲルト団長から
緊急指令が届いているんだ
MsgEn:
I've got an urgent order from Commander Gerd, who
went to the Volden Large Tunnels to investigate.

MsgJp:
準備を整えたら、ミッションエントリーをしてくれ
俺も共に向かうぞ
MsgEn:
Once you're ready, please enter the mission.
I will also join you.

MsgJp:
――先のミッションで物凄い戦果を
挙げたそうだな
MsgEn:
I heard you achieved an amazing victory in the
previous mission.

MsgJp:
特別なアビリティを与えるよう言われている
ふん――役に立つと良いがな
MsgEn:
I've been told to give you a special Augment.
Well, I hope it proves useful.

MsgJp:
ボルド大坑道でのミッション、ご苦労だったな
――助かった、礼をいう
MsgEn:
Thank you for your hard work on the Volden Large
Tunnels mission. I am grateful for your help.

MsgJp:
戦果についての確認が終わり次第
保管ボックスにて報酬を受け取れるようになる
受け取りを忘れるなよ
MsgEn:
After the results have been confirmed, you will
be able to receive your reward in the Storage Box.
Don't forget to pick it up.

MsgJp: 魔赤島にアルタード・ズールが現れた
MsgEn: An Altered Zuhl has appeared on Bloodbane Isle.

MsgJp:
こんなことを覚者に頼むのも癪だが――
かなり切迫した状況だ
MsgEn:
Even though it pains me to have to burden the
Arisen with this, it's a very desperate situation.

MsgJp:
駐屯地が危険にさらされている――
すぐに準備を整え、ミッションエントリーを
して欲しい
――食い止めてくれ
MsgEn:
The garrison is in danger!
Get ready immediately and register for the
mission.
Stop the enemy!

MsgJp:
――貴君は他のミッションの元に
パーティを組んでいるな
MsgEn: You are part of a party for another mission.

MsgJp:
先にそちらのミッションの参加予定を
取り消し、あらためてここに来てくれ
MsgEn:
Please cancel your participation in the mission
over there first, and then come here again.

MsgJp:
今回も何とか魔物を退けたな
――我々への協力、感謝する
MsgEn:
Once again, we managed to drive away the monsters.
Thank you for your cooperation.

MsgJp:
ミッションの戦果が発表された者から
保管ボックスより順次報酬を渡すぞ
MsgEn:
We'll distribute rewards sequentially from the
storage box to those whose mission achievements
have been announced.

MsgJp:
先の戦いについて
多くの戦果を挙げた貴君に対して
特別なアビリティが送られることになった
MsgEn:
As a reward for your many accomplishments in the
previous battle, you will receive special
Augments.

MsgJp: ぜひ受け取ってくれ――
MsgEn: Please accept it with gratitude--

MsgJp:
“シェドレアン大神殿”での問題を
解決してくれたみたいね！
アデルドナハからも、礼をいっておいてくれと
言われたよ――
MsgEn:
It seems like you solved the problem at the
Shadolean Great Temple!
Adair Donnchadh told me to thank you...

MsgJp:
今は戦果の分析中だから
もうしばらく待っていてちょうだい
MsgEn:
I'm in the process of analyzing the war results,
so you'll have to wait a while longer.

MsgJp:
今回のミッションでは物凄いはたらきを
してくれたみたいね！
MsgEn: You did a tremendous job on this mission!

MsgJp:
戦果の報酬として、シークレットアビリティが
付与されるよ
受け取ってちょうだい
MsgEn:
As a reward for your battle results, you will
receive a Secret Augment.
Please take it!

MsgJp:
ダクレイム砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
現在、各個人の戦果を確認しているところだ
MsgEn:
The war mission at Dacreim Fortress has ended.
We are currently checking each individual's
achievements.

MsgJp: 集計が終わるまで、しばらくの間待っていてほしい
MsgEn:
I hope you'll wait a while for the tally to be
completed.

MsgJp:
あんたの持っているDPと引き換えに
品物を提供しよう
ラインナップを確認してみてくれ
MsgEn:
In exchange for the DP you possess, I shall offer
you goods.
Please take a look at the lineup.

MsgJp:
一部のアイテムには、条件を満たした者にしか
与えられない特別なアイテムが存在する
MsgEn:
There are special items that can only be given to
those who meet the requirements.

MsgJp:
戦いにおいて、どれだけの成果を達成したかにより
提供できるアイテムも変わってくるぞ
MsgEn:
The items that can be obtained through battle
depend on the achievements made.
